name: Swipe in Light!
description:
Grab this unique new exciting puzzle game for FREE!

Swipe up, down and all around to send your paint jelly through the maze as you fill it with color. It feels so satisfying, who doesn't love a clean coat of fresh paint?

Complete the levels of each puzzle by covering the whole maze with vibrant paint.

Super simple swipe puzzle. What level can you get to?

FEATURES
- 6000+ unique puzzles to solve.
- Super simple swipe controls.
- Smooth and satisfying paint colors.
- Fun and relaxing to play.
- Free to play.
- Bright and colourful.
- Simple and satisfying.
- Beautifully clean and smooth physics.


Stuck on a level? Just restart or skip it!
Have Fun!!!
